author: RTÉ News
title: Foster believes that lockdown will last beyond Easter
description: Stormont First Minister Arlene Foster believes that sweeping new Covid-19 restrictions in the UK will last more than three weeks.
content:
Stormont First Minister Arlene Foster believes that sweeping new Covid-19 restrictions in the UK will last more than three weeks.
She said if she was a "betting person" she would think the measures will continue beyond Easter.
People must remain at home exc… [+592 chars]
